mapper.sql: RQST_NO , RQST_SNO , RQST_DTL_SNO , RQST_DTL_DTL_SNO , VRF_CD , VRF_RMK , RVW_STS_CD , RVW_CONTS , RQST_DCD , PDM_REL_ID, PDM_REL_LNM, PDM_REL_PNM , REL_TYP_CD, CRD_TYP_CD , PA_OPT_TYP_CD , PA_SUBJ_ID, PA_FULL_PATH , PA_TBL_ID, PA_TBL_PNM , PA_COL_ID, PA_COL_PNM , CH_SUBJ_ID, CH_FULL_PATH , CH_TBL_ID, CH_TBL_PNM , CH_COL_ID, CH_COL_PNM , OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID , RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID

A.RQST_NO , A.RQST_SNO , A.RQST_DTL_SNO , A.RQST_DTL_DTL_SNO , A.PDM_REL_ID , A.PDM_REL_PNM, A.PDM_REL_LNM , A.VRF_CD , A.VRF_RMK , A.RVW_STS_CD , A.RVW_CONTS , A.RQST_DCD , A.REL_TYP_CD, A.CRD_TYP_CD , A.PA_OPT_TYP_CD , A.PA_SUBJ_ID, A.PA_FULL_PATH , A.PA_TBL_ID, A.PA_TBL_PNM , A.PA_COL_ID, A.PA_COL_PNM , A.CH_SUBJ_ID, A.CH_FULL_PATH , A.CH_TBL_ID, A.CH_TBL_PNM , A.CH_COL_ID, A.CH_COL_PNM , A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS, A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID , A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID
mapper.insert: insert /* WaqPdmRelColMapper.insert */ into WAQ_PDM_REL_COL (RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, RQST_DTL_SNO, PDM_REL_PNM, PA_TBL_PNM, PA_COL_PNM, CH_TBL_PNM, CH_COL_PNM, PDM_REL_ID, PDM_REL_LNM, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK, RQST_DCD, REL_TYP_CD, CRD_TYP_CD, PA_OPT_TYP_CD, PA_SUBJ_ID, PA_FULL_PATH, PA_TBL_ID, PA_COL_ID, CH_SUBJ_ID, CH_FULL_PATH, CH_TBL_ID, CH_COL_ID, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID ) values (#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rqstDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pdmRelPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pdmRelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pdmRelLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crdTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paOptTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paFullPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paColId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chFullPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chColId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

INSERT /* WaqPdmRelColMapper.insertSelective */ INTO WAQ_PDM_REL_COL
RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, RQST_DTL_SNO, RQST_DTL_DTL_SNO,
PDM_REL_COL_ID,
PDM_REL_PNM,
PDM_REL_LNM,
PDM_REL_ID,
VRF_CD,
VRF_RMK,
RQST_DCD,
REL_TYP_CD,
CRD_TYP_CD,
PA_OPT_TYP_CD,
PA_SUBJ_ID,
PA_FULL_PATH,
PA_TBL_ID,
PA_TBL_PNM,
PA_COL_PNM,
CH_SUBJ_ID,
CH_FULL_PATH,
CH_TBL_ID,
CH_TBL_PNM,
CH_COL_PNM,
OBJ_DESCN,
OBJ_VERS,
REG_TYP_CD,
FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM,
RQST_USER_ID,
APRV_DTM,
APRV_USER_ID,
#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rqstDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(RQST_DTL_DTL_SNO), 0) + 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_REL_COL WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RQST_DTL_SNO = #{rqstDtlSno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ),
#{pdmRelColId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pdmRelPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pdmRelLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pdmRelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{relTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{paTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{paColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

1,

NOW(), #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW(),

mapper.update:
update /* WaqPdmRelColMapper.updateByPrimaryKeySelective */ WAQ_PDM_REL_COL
PDM_REL_ID = #{pdmRelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PDM_REL_LNM = #{pdmRelLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REL_TYP_CD = #{relTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRD_TYP_CD = #{crdTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PA_OPT_TYP_CD = #{paOptTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PA_SUBJ_ID = #{paSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PA_FULL_PATH = #{paFullPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PA_TBL_ID = #{paTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CH_SUBJ_ID = #{chSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CH_FULL_PATH = #{chFullPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CH_TBL_ID = #{chTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PDM_REL_PNM = #{pdmRelPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PA_TBL_PNM = #{paTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PA_COL_PNM = #{paColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CH_TBL_PNM = #{chTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CH_COL_PNM = #{chColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND RQST_DTL_SNO = #{rqstDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update /* WaqPdmRelColMapper.updateByPrimaryKey */ WAQ_PDM_REL_COL set PDM_REL_ID = #{pdmRelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PDM_REL_LNM = #{pdmRelLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REL_TYP_CD = #{relTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRD_TYP_CD = #{crdTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PA_OPT_TYP_CD = #{paOptTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PA_SUBJ_ID = #{paSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PA_FULL_PATH = #{paFullPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PA_TBL_ID = #{paTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PA_COL_ID = #{paColId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CH_SUBJ_ID = #{chSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CH_FULL_PATH = #{chFullPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CH_TBL_ID = #{chTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CH_COL_ID = #{chColId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and RQST_DTL_SNO = #{rqstDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and PDM_REL_PNM = #{pdmRelPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PA_TBL_PNM = #{paTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PA_COL_PNM = #{paColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CH_TBL_PNM = #{chTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CH_COL_PNM = #{chColPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE /* WaqPdmRelColMapper.updateCheckInit */ WAQ_PDM_REL_COL A SET (A.REG_TYP_CD, A.PDM_REL_COL_ID, A.PDM_REL_ID) = (SELECT CASE WHEN A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' THEN 'D' ELSE CASE WHEN MAX(B.PDM_REL_PNM) IS NULL THEN 'C' ELSE 'U' END END , MAX(B.PDM_REL_COL_ID) , MAX(C.PDM_REL_ID) FROM WAM_PDM_REL_COL B INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_REL_MST C ON C.PDM_REL_ID = B.PDM_REL_ID WHERE C.PDM_REL_PNM = A.PDM_REL_PNM AND C.PA_FULL_PATH = A.PA_FULL_PATH AND C.PA_TBL_PNM = A.PA_TBL_PNM AND B.PA_COL_PNM = A.PA_COL_PNM AND C.CH_FULL_PATH = A.CH_FULL_PATH AND C.CH_TBL_PNM = A.CH_TBL_PNM AND B.CH_COL_PNM = A.CH_COL_PNM ) , A.VRF_CD = '4' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

UPDATE /* WaqPdmRelColMapper.updateSubjId */ WAQ_PDM_REL_COL A SET (A.PA_SUBJ_ID, A.CH_SUBJ_ID) = (select B.SUBJ_ID, C.SUBJ_ID from WAA_SUBJ B INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ C ON 1=1 AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND C.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') where B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND B.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND B.FULL_PATH = A.PA_FULL_PATH AND C.FULL_PATH = A.CH_FULL_PATH ) ,A.VRF_CD = '4' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
/* WaqPdmRelColMapper.checkPaSubj */
--검증쿼리 : 부모엔터티 주제영역명 미존재 (PR001) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.PA_SUBJ_ID IS NULL

/* WaqPdmRelColMapper.checkPaEnty */
--검증쿼리 : 부모엔터티명 미존재 (PR002) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PDM_TBL D INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ E ON D.SUBJ_ID = E.SUBJ_ID AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND E.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') WHERE D.PDM_TBL_PNM = A.PA_TBL_PNM AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND E.FULL_PATH = A.PA_FULL_PATH ) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_TBL D INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ E ON E.FULL_PATH = D.FULL_PATH AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND E.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') WHERE D.PDM_TBL_PNM = A.PA_TBL_PNM AND D.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND D.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO )

/* WaqPdmRelColMapper.checkPaAttr */
--검증쿼리 : 부모엔터티 속성명 미존재 (PR003) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PDM_TBL D INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_COL E ON E.PDM_TBL_ID = D.PDM_TBL_ID INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ F ON F.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND F.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND F.SUBJ_ID = D.SUBJ_ID WHERE D.PDM_TBL_PNM = A.PA_TBL_PNM AND E.PDM_COL_PNM = A.PA_COL_PNM AND F.FULL_PATH = A.PA_FULL_PATH )

/* WaqPdmRelColMapper.checkChSubj */
--검증쿼리 : 자식엔터티 주제영역명 미존재 (PR004) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.CH_SUBJ_ID IS NULL

/* WaqPdmRelColMapper.checkChEnty */
--검증쿼리 : 자식엔터티명 미존재 (PR005) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PDM_TBL D INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ E ON D.SUBJ_ID = E.SUBJ_ID AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND E.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') WHERE D.PDM_TBL_PNM = A.CH_TBL_PNM AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND E.FULL_PATH = A.CH_FULL_PATH ) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_TBL D INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ E ON E.FULL_PATH = D.FULL_PATH AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND E.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') WHERE D.PDM_TBL_PNM = A.CH_TBL_PNM AND D.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND D.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO )

/* WaqPdmRelColMapper.checkChAttr */
--검증쿼리 : 자식엔터티 속성명 미존재 (PR006) AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PDM_TBL D INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_COL E ON E.PDM_TBL_ID = D.PDM_TBL_ID INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ F ON F.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND F.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND F.SUBJ_ID = D.SUBJ_ID WHERE D.PDM_TBL_PNM = A.CH_TBL_PNM AND E.PDM_COL_PNM = A.CH_COL_PNM AND F.FULL_PATH = A.CH_FULL_PATH )

/* WaqPdmRelColMapper.checkDupRel */
--검증쿼리 : 중복 관계명 (부모, 자식내용까지) 동일한 관계 검출(PR011)
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_REL_COL D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = D.RQST_SNO
AND A.PDM_REL_PNM = D.PDM_REL_PNM AND A.PA_FULL_PATH = D.PA_FULL_PATH AND A.PA_TBL_PNM = D.PA_TBL_PNM AND A.PA_COL_PNM = D.PA_COL_PNM AND A.CH_FULL_PATH = D.CH_FULL_PATH AND A.CH_TBL_PNM = D.CH_TBL_PNM AND A.CH_COL_PNM = D.CH_COL_PNM
AND A.RQST_DTL_SNO != D.RQST_DTL_SNO)

/* WaqPdmRelColMapper.checkNotChgData */
--검증쿼리 : 변경사항 없을경우 (PR000) AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PDM_REL_MST D INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_REL_COL E ON E.PDM_REL_ID = D.PDM_REL_ID WHERE D.PDM_REL_PNM = A.PDM_REL_PNM AND D.PA_FULL_PATH = A.PA_FULL_PATH AND D.PA_TBL_PNM = A.PA_TBL_PNM AND D.CH_FULL_PATH = A.CH_FULL_PATH AND D.CH_TBL_PNM = A.CH_TBL_PNM AND E.PA_COL_PNM = A.PA_COL_PNM AND E.CH_COL_PNM = A.CH_COL_PNM AND IFNULL(E.OBJ_DESCN, '') = IFNULL(A.OBJ_DESCN, '') )

-- 없는 컬럼을 삭제대상으로 추가한다.... INSERT /* WaqPdmRelColMapper.insertDelInit */ INTO WAQ_PDM_REL_COL ( RQST_NO , RQST_SNO , RQST_DTL_SNO , RQST_DTL_DTL_SNO , PDM_REL_COL_ID , RQST_DCD , REG_TYP_CD , VRF_CD , PDM_REL_ID , PDM_REL_PNM , PDM_REL_LNM , PA_SUBJ_ID , PA_FULL_PATH , PA_TBL_ID , PA_TBL_PNM , PA_COL_ID , PA_COL_PNM , CH_SUBJ_ID , CH_FULL_PATH , CH_TBL_ID , CH_TBL_PNM , CH_COL_ID , CH_COL_PNM , OBJ_DESCN , OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID ) SELECT B.RQST_NO , B.RQST_SNO , B.RQST_DTL_SNO , (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(X.RQST_DTL_DTL_SNO), 0) FROM WAQ_PDM_REL_COL X WHERE X.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND X.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO AND X.RQST_DTL_SNO = B.RQST_DTL_SNO ) + ROWNUM AS RQST_DTL_DTL_SNO , D.PDM_REL_COL_ID , 'DD' AS RQST_DCD , 'D' AS REG_TYP_CD , '4' AS VRF_CD , C.PDM_REL_ID , C.PDM_REL_PNM , C.PDM_REL_LNM , D.PA_SUBJ_ID , D.PA_FULL_PATH , D.PA_TBL_ID , D.PA_TBL_PNM , D.PA_COL_ID , D.PA_COL_PNM , D.CH_SUBJ_ID , D.CH_FULL_PATH , D.CH_TBL_ID , D.CH_TBL_PNM , D.CH_COL_ID , D.CH_COL_PNM , D.OBJ_DESCN , D.OBJ_VERS, D.FRS_RQST_DTM, D.FRS_RQST_USER_ID FROM WAQ_PDM_REL_MST B INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_REL_MST C ON C.PDM_REL_ID = B.PDM_REL_ID INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_REL_COL D ON D.PDM_REL_ID = C.PDM_REL_ID WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_REL_COL X WHERE B.RQST_NO = X.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = X.RQST_SNO AND B.RQST_DTL_SNO = X.RQST_DTL_SNO AND D.PA_COL_PNM = X.PA_COL_PNM AND D.CH_COL_PNM = X.CH_COL_PNM )
mapper.update: UPDATE /* WaqPdmRelColMapper.updateRqstDcdbyRelMst */ WAQ_PDM_REL_COL A SET RQST_DCD = 'DD' , REG_TYP_CD = 'D' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_REL_MST B WHERE B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND B.RQST_DTL_SNO = A.RQST_DTL_SNO AND B.RQST_DCD = 'DD' )
mapper.select: --신규 적재 대상 추출 SELECT /* WaqPdmRelColMapper.selectWaqC */ A.* FROM WAQ_PDM_REL_COL A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' --승인 AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'C'
mapper.update: --WAQ ID, VERS 등을 업데이트... UPDATE /* WaqPdmRelColMapper.updateWaqCUD */ WAQ_PDM_REL_COL A SET (PDM_REL_COL_ID, OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID) = ( SELECT B.PDM_REL_COL_ID , IFNULL(B.OBJ_VERS, 0) + 1 AS OBJ_VERS , B.FRS_RQST_DTM , B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID FROM WAM_PDM_REL_COL B WHERE B.PDM_REL_PNM = A.PDM_REL_PNM AND B.PA_FULL_PATH = A.PA_FULL_PATH AND B.PA_TBL_PNM = A.PA_TBL_PNM AND B.PA_COL_PNM = A.PA_COL_PNM AND B.CH_FULL_PATH = A.CH_FULL_PATH AND B.CH_TBL_PNM = A.CH_TBL_PNM AND B.CH_COL_PNM = A.CH_COL_PNM ) WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.VRF_CD = '1' --등록가능 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PDM_REL_COL B WHERE B.PDM_REL_PNM = A.PDM_REL_PNM AND B.PA_FULL_PATH = A.PA_FULL_PATH AND B.PA_TBL_PNM = A.PA_TBL_PNM AND B.PA_COL_PNM = A.PA_COL_PNM AND B.CH_FULL_PATH = A.CH_FULL_PATH AND B.CH_TBL_PNM = A.CH_TBL_PNM AND B.CH_COL_PNM = A.CH_COL_PNM )

--주제영역 ID, 테이블 ID, 컬럼ID 업데이트... UPDATE /* WaqPdmRelColMapper.updateWaqId */ WAQ_PDM_REL_COL X SET (PA_SUBJ_ID, PA_TBL_ID, PA_COL_ID) = (SELECT A.SUBJ_ID, A.PDM_TBL_ID, B.PDM_COL_ID FROM WAM_PDM_TBL A INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_COL B ON B.PDM_TBL_ID = A.PDM_TBL_ID WHERE A.FULL_PATH = X.PA_FULL_PATH AND A.PDM_TBL_PNM = X.PA_TBL_PNM AND B.PDM_COL_PNM = X.PA_COL_PNM ) , (CH_SUBJ_ID, CH_TBL_ID, CH_COL_ID) = (SELECT A.SUBJ_ID, A.PDM_TBL_ID, B.PDM_COL_ID FROM WAM_PDM_TBL A INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_COL B ON B.PDM_TBL_ID = A.PDM_TBL_ID WHERE A.FULL_PATH = X.CH_FULL_PATH AND A.PDM_TBL_PNM = X.CH_TBL_PNM AND B.PDM_COL_PNM = X.CH_COL_PNM ) , PDM_REL_ID = (SELECT PDM_REL_ID FROM WAQ_PDM_REL_MST A WHERE A.RQST_NO = X.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = X.RQST_SNO AND A.RQST_DTL_SNO = X.RQST_DTL_SNO ) WHERE X.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND X.VRF_CD = '1' --등록가능
mapper.sql: PDM_REL_PNM , PDM_REL_LNM , PDM_REL_ID , PA_SUBJ_ID , PA_FULL_PATH , PA_TBL_ID , PA_TBL_PNM , PA_COL_ID , PA_COL_PNM , CH_SUBJ_ID , CH_FULL_PATH , CH_TBL_ID , CH_TBL_PNM , CH_COL_ID , CH_COL_PNM , RQST_NO , RQST_SNO , RQST_DTL_SNO , RQST_DTL_DTL_SNO , OBJ_DESCN , OBJ_VERS , REG_TYP_CD , FRS_RQST_DTM , FRS_RQST_USER_ID , RQST_DTM , RQST_USER_ID , APRV_DTM , APRV_USER_ID
mapper.delete: --WAM 삭제 (등록유형코드가REG_TYP_CD 변경, 삭제일 경우) DELETE /* WaqPdmRelColMapper.deleteWAM */ FROM WAM_PDM_REL_COL A WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_REL_COL B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.PDM_REL_COL_ID = A.PDM_REL_COL_ID AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.VRF_CD = '1' )
mapper.insert: --WAM 추가 (WAQ 내용을 추가, REG_TYP_CD 가 신규,변경일 경우) INSERT /* WaqPdmRelColMapper.insertWAM */ INTO WAM_PDM_REL_COL ( PDM_REL_COL_ID , ) SELECT A.PDM_REL_COL_ID , FROM WAQ_PDM_REL_COL A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.VRF_CD = '1' AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1'
mapper.update:
--WAH 이력 만료... UPDATE /* WaqPdmRelColMapper.updateWAH */ WAH_PDM_REL A SET EXP_DTM = NOW() WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_TBL B JOIN WAQ_PDM_REL_COL C ON B.RQST_NO = C.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = C.RQST_SNO WHERE C.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND C.PA_SUBJ_ID = A.PA_SUBJ_ID AND C.PA_TBL_ID = A.PA_TBL_ID AND C.PA_COL_ID = A.PA_COL_ID AND C.CH_SUBJ_ID = A.CH_SUBJ_ID AND C.CH_TBL_ID = A.CH_TBL_ID AND C.CH_COL_ID = A.CH_COL_ID AND C.PDM_REL_ID = A.PDM_REL_ID
AND C.VRF_CD = '1' AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' ) AND EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.insert: --WAH이력 적재... INSERT /* WaqPdmRelColMapper.insertWAH */ INTO WAH_PDM_REL SELECT A.PDM_REL_ID , STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AS EXP_DTM , NOW() AS STR_DTM , FROM WAQ_PDM_REL_COL A JOIN WAQ_PDM_TBL B ON B.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND B.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.VRF_CD = '1' AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1'
mapper.update: UPDATE /* WaqPdmRelColMapper.updatervwStsCdForCol */ WAQ_PDM_REL_COL A SET RVW_STS_CD = (SELECT X.RVW_STS_CD FROM WAQ_PDM_REL_MST X WHERE X.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND X.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND X.RQST_DTL_SNO = A.RQST_DTL_SNO ) WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_REL_MST X WHERE X.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND X.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND X.RQST_DTL_SNO = A.RQST_DTL_SNO )
mapper.insert: --테이블 추가시 WAM에 존재하는 컬럼 추가한다. INSERT /* WaqPdmRelColMapper.insertByRqstSno */ INTO WAQ_PDM_REL_COL( RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, RQST_DTL_SNO, PDM_REL_ID, PDM_REL_PNM, PDM_REL_LNM, RQST_DCD , REL_TYP_CD, CRD_TYP_CD, PA_OPT_TYP_CD, PA_SUBJ_ID, PA_FULL_PATH, PA_TBL_ID, PA_TBL_PNM, PA_COL_ID, PA_COL_PNM , CH_SUBJ_ID, CH_FULL_PATH, CH_TBL_ID, CH_TBL_PNM, CH_COL_ID, CH_COL_PNM , OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID ) SELECT B.RQST_NO, B.RQST_SNO , (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(RQST_DTL_SNO), 0) FROM WAQ_PDM_REL_COL WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno} ) + ROWNUM AS RQST_DTL_SNO , C.PDM_REL_ID, C.PDM_REL_PNM, C.PDM_REL_LNM, 'CU' AS RQST_DCD , C.REL_TYP_CD, C.CRD_TYP_CD, C.PA_OPT_TYP_CD, C.PA_SUBJ_ID, D.FULL_PATH, C.PA_TBL_ID, E.PDM_TBL_PNM, C.PA_COL_ID, F.PDM_COL_PNM , C.CH_SUBJ_ID, G.FULL_PATH, C.CH_TBL_ID, H.PDM_TBL_PNM, C.CH_COL_ID, I.PDM_COL_PNM , C.OBJ_DESCN, C.OBJ_VERS, B.FRS_RQST_DTM, B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, NOW(), B.RQST_USER_ID FROM WAM_PDM_TBL A JOIN WAQ_PDM_TBL B ON A.PDM_TBL_ID = B.PDM_TBL_ID INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_REL C ON A.PDM_TBL_ID = C.CH_TBL_ID AND A.SUBJ_ID = C.CH_SUBJ_ID INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ D ON C.PA_SUBJ_ID = D.SUBJ_ID AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND D.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_TBL E ON C.PA_TBL_ID = E.PDM_TBL_ID AND E.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_COL F ON E.PDM_TBL_ID = F.PDM_TBL_ID AND C.PA_COL_ID = F.PDM_COL_ID AND F.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ G ON C.CH_SUBJ_ID = G.SUBJ_ID AND G.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND G.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_TBL H ON C.CH_TBL_ID = H.PDM_TBL_ID AND H.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') INNER JOIN WAM_PDM_COL I ON H.PDM_TBL_ID = I.PDM_TBL_ID AND C.CH_COL_ID = I.PDM_COL_ID AND I.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno}
mapper.select: SELECT /* WaqPdmRelColMapper.selectMaxRqstSno */ IFNULL(MAX(RQST_SNO),0) + 1 AS RQST_SNO FROM WAQ_PDM_REL_COL WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
